block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Named Ed Kenney special assistant to vice president of baseball operations. TEXAS RANGERS--Fired Dick Bosman pitching coach. Announced bullpen coach Larry Hardy will handle the pitching coach duties for the rest of the season.
National League CHICAGO CUBS--Agreed to terms with RHP Tim Worrell on a two-year contract extension through the 2002 season.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Named Ed Kenney special assistant to vice president of baseball operations. TEXAS RANGERS--Fired Dick Bosman pitching coach. Announced bullpen coach Larry Hardy will handle the pitching coach duties for the rest of the season.
National League CHICAGO CUBS--Agreed to terms with RHP Tim Worrell on a two-year contract extension through the 2002 season.

National Basketball Association NBA--Approved the trade that sent F Corliss Williamson to the Toronto Raptors and G Doug Christie to the Sacramento Kings. CLEVELAND CAVALIERS--Signed G-F Willie Burton, G Khalid Reeves, G Johnny Hemsley, and C Robert Werdann. DALLAS MAVERICKS--Signed F Etan Thomas, G Courtney Alexander and F Donnell Harvey to three-year contracts. Agreed to terms with F Eduardo Najera on a two-year contract. LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Signed G Earl Boykins, F Zendon Hamilton, G Ryan Lorthridge, C Joe Vogel and F Rocky Walls. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Waived F Chuck Person. MIAMI HEAT--Agreed to terms with G Tim Hardaway on a one-year contract. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed C Ed Stokes, F Eddie Elisma, F Brandon Williams, and G Tyson Wheeler.

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Traded F Matt Johnson to Minnesota for San Jose's 2001 third-round draft pick. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Assigned C Blake Bellefeuille to Syracuse of the AHL. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Returned D Rich Brennan and RW Peter LeBoutillier to Lowell of the AHL. Designated Philippe Boucher for assignment. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Traded a 2001 third-round draft pick to Philadelphia for D Mark Eaton. Signed D Kimmo Timonen to a two-year contract. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Assigned G Jean-Francois Damphousse, G Frederic Henry, D Daryl Andrews, D Josef Boumedienne, D Mike Commodore, D Alex Johnstone, D Andre Lakos, D Lucas Nehrling, D Henrik Rehnberg, F Jiri Bicek, F Max Birbraer, F Sylvain Cloutier, F Pierre Dagenais, F Bryan Duce, F Chris Ferraro, F Stanislav Gron, F Mike Jefferson, F Jason Lehoux, F Carlyle Lewis, F Ryan Pepperall, F Richard Rochefort, F Mike Rupp, F Rob Skrlac, F Doug Stienstra and F Chris Thompson to Albany of the AHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed C Kris Beech to a three-year contract. International Hockey League KANSAS CITY BLADES--Announced the Vancouver Canucks have assigned G Corey Schwab, F Vadim Sharifijanov, F Josh Holden, F Harold Druken and F Brad Leeb to the team.
East Coast Hockey League PENSACOLA ICE PILOTS--Signed RW Shane Calder.
West Coast Hockey League LONG BEACH ICE DOGS--Signed RW Dimitri Kirilenko and C Brian Secord. SAN DIEGO GULLS--Traded F Corey Liniak to Phoenix for future considerations.
